components.description:
A green pea pod split to reveal a row of peas inside.

Can be used to talk about actual pea pods or peas, pods or vegetables in general, or the color green. May be used along with the phrase two peas in a pod.
components.title: Pea Pod

description:

title: Pea Pod

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.

 

  • üìù Unicode 15.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: The pea pod emoji on Apple devices showcases a plump, bright green pod, gently curved and bursting with character. Apple‚Äôs signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a delightful, tactile appearance, with subtle highlights suggesting the roundness of the peas nestled within. This charming representation of nature's bounty is often used to convey growth, new beginnings, or a healthy, wholesome element in messages.
